unnormalised: Hey folks, gas cylinder prices are making us all say "Hai Ram!" again.
normalised: Hey folks, gas cylinder prices are making us all say "Hai Ram!" again.

unnormalised: Seems like Indane and HP Gas have hiked prices by Rs. 50 per cylinder *again*. This latest jump hits both subsidized and non-subsidized cylinders.
normalised: Seems like Indane and H P Gas have hiked prices by rupee fifty per cylinder again. This latest jump hits both subsidized and non-subsidized cylinders.

unnormalised: For those in Delhi, expect to shell out around Rs. 1100 for a regular 14.2 kg cylinder. Kolkata's also feeling the pinch.
normalised: For those in Delhi, expect to shell out around rupee one thousand one hundred for a regular fourteen point two kilogram cylinder. Kolkata's also feeling the pinch.

unnormalised: Experts, like Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi, are saying global energy prices are to blame, but that doesn't make the cooking any cheaper, does it?
normalised: Experts, like Doctor Sharma from I I T-Delhi, are saying global energy prices are to blame, but that doesn't make the cooking any cheaper, does it?

unnormalised: Many families in Mumbai living in smaller homes, like a 500 sq ft apartment, are especially feeling the squeeze. Less disposable income for Diwali mithai!
normalised: Many families in Mumbai living in smaller homes, like a five hundred square feet apartment, are especially feeling the squeeze. Less disposable income for Diwali mithai!

unnormalised: The government is saying they're monitoring the situation, but a lot of us are hoping for some relief soon. Maybe we should all switch to cooking on chulhas? Just kidding… mostly! Keep an eye out for more updates. Stay tuned!
normalised: The government is saying they're monitoring the situation, but a lot of us are hoping for some relief soon. Maybe we should all switch to cooking on chulhas? Just kidding… mostly! Keep an eye out for more updates. Stay tuned!
